1010111010110001 1100111110111111 0 -> sum: 0111111001110000, cout: 1
0010010010100000 0100110011111010 1 -> sum: 0111000110011011, cout: 0
0101011100000101 0100101000010100 1 -> sum: 1010000100011010, cout: 0
1000000010001111 0110001000001000 0 -> sum: 1110001010010111, cout: 0
0110011110110010 1101100111011110 0 -> sum: 0100000110010000, cout: 1
0000000011001100 0110101111001000 1 -> sum: 0110110010010101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
